## Source: ossf-package-analysis (74e84b9a555df93618c5127eddd0b90f79c79e8b54a5c60a0deb241487f867d7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'gear-bridge-common' @ 1337.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
